creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
signed: on bottom, burned in brown: [M]; on bottom, in white: [ED MOULTHROP / FIGURED TULIPWOOD / LIRIODENDRON / TULIPIFERA / 214810]
text: Ed Moulthrop, the patriarch of the Moulthrop wood-turning family, was father to Philip Moulthrop and grandfather to Matt Moulthrop, whose work is also shown in this case.  Ed developed an affinity for woods local to his Atlanta studio, including tulipwood, which he turned on a small and large scale; an example of the latter can be seen in the photograph on the text panel in this exhibition.
title: Vessel
